::Primal Prime::

    He jumped in the air and transformed to flight mode. =
He then took off towards sector 3.

::CyberShark::

    He neared the Destr=
on base. It was in ruins. There were two groups of Destrons getting ready f=
or a fight, one was the group that he knew, Shredder, Mantella, and the Des=
trocons. other he didn't know but the scanners reported that they were Dest=
ron.
    "Attention, all Destrons," He said, hoping to end the feud. "This =
is CyberShark, Magmatron's ultimate creation. End this fight before it begi=
ns."
